post:
It's been a long time since we have posted an offer here on the LowEndTalk forums so we figured we would make a come back with an awesome deal on our new dedicated server. 

Coupon code: **helloagain**

* Intel Quad Core E3-1240
* 16 GB DDR3 RAM
* 2 X 500 GB Enterprise SATA Drives
* 1 Gbps Dedicated Network Uplink
* 10 TB Bandwidth Transfer
* North Carolina Location Only!

 > [Configure now](https://portal.bigbrainglobal.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=397)
 
Terms: New server orders only, limited time and will expire at midnight on Wednesday, March 2nd, 2016!
